law.text: The master commissioner shall execute a bond, with surety approved by the court. The bond shall be recorded in court. He shall execute a special bond when required by the court and no action shall be maintained on his general bond for matters covered by a special bond.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 49, effective January 2, 1978.
